alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 7:34PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Village Creek Near Kountze Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Village Creek Near Kountze. * WHEN...From late Monday night to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.4 feet, The water will be at the low chord of Highway 418. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Sunday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning to a crest of 18.2 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Village Creek Kountze 17.0 14.1 Sun 6 pm CST 15.7 17.8 18.2 &&
